data.exclude: IP address to exclude from tracking
data.home_interval: Minimum number of minutes between scans of active devices (preserve battery)
data.hosts: IP address or range to scan
data.mac_exclude: MAC address to exclude from tracking
data.scan_options: Raw configurable scan options for Nmap

user.description: Configure hosts to be scanned by Nmap. IP address and excludes can be addresses (192.168.1.1), networks (192.168.0.0/24) or ranges (192.168.1.0-32).

data.consider_home: Seconds to wait till marking a device tracker as not home after not being seen.
